ServersÂ¶

Seatbelt is capable of using any server through decorator wrappers. Currently all major node servers are supported: Express, Restify, Koa, and Hapi.

#### Restify

Install

```bash
npm install @seatbelt/restify –save

```

Usage

```typescript import { DRestify } from '@seatbelt/server-restify‘; import { IServer } from '@seatbelt/core‘;

@DRestify() export class Server implements IServer {} ```

#### Express

Install

```bash
npm install @seatbelt/express –save

```

Usage

```typescript import { DExpress } from '@seatbelt/server-express‘; import { IServer } from '@seatbelt/core‘;

@DExpress() export class Server implements IServer {} ```

#### Hapi

Install

```bash
npm install @seatbelt/hapi –save

```

Usage

```typescript import { DHapi } from '@seatbelt/server-hapi‘; import { IServer } from '@seatbelt/core‘;

@DHapi() export class Server implements IServer {} ```

#### Koa

Install

```bash
npm install @seatbelt/koa –save

```

Usage

```typescript import { DKoa } from '@seatbelt/server-koa‘; import { IServer } from '@seatbelt/core‘;

@DKoa() export class Server implements IServer {} ```
